pageContext.claim: “As horrible as it sounds, when they throw the large sacks of drugs over, and if you have people on the other side of the wall, you don't see them — they hit you on the head with 60 pounds of stuff?  It's over.  As crazy as that sounds, you need transparency through that wall.”
pageContext.analysis: There have been reports of drug smugglers catapulting drugs across the border, but most drugs are smuggled through legal checkpoints at the border.
